page.title: 06My House
page.content: My address is 2 Whitcliffe Terrace. It is a three bedroomed house.It has a kitchen,living room and bathroom.In the house live four people and a dog. These are Mum,Dad,Tina my sister,Sheba our dog and me.Tina and I each have our own bedroom.Mine is Quite large and is blue and white.There is a fluffy grey and white carpet,a white wardrobe and cupboardand a bookcase full of encyclopedias plus all my toys and games.Tina's room is similar but rather smaller.In the living room we have a brown three piece suite,a patterned carpet,a large colour TV,a stereo unit and a coal fire.In the kitchen is a cooker,a freezer,a washing machine,a sink unit and a cupboard for pots and pans.There is a small garden at the front and another at the back of the house. Simon Jones.
